_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: tModLoader
author: parker@parkervcp.com
description:
tModLoader modified by Ashu.
Version: 2.0
Check for updates: https://github.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs
startup: ARCH=$([ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ] && echo "amd64" || echo "arm64") && $(if [ "${ARCH}" == "arm64" ]; then echo -n "mono ./tModLoader*.exe -config serverconfig.txt"; else echo -n "./tModLoaderServer -config serverconfig.txt"; fi)

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Vanilla tModloader Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
## install packages to get version and download links
apt update
apt install -y curl p7zip-full wget jq file
ARCH=$([[ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ]] && echo "amd64" || echo "arm64")
if [[ "${ARCH}" == "amd64" ]]; then
GITHUB_PACKAGE=tmodloader/tmodloader
if [ -z "$GITHUB_USER" ] && [ -z "$GITHUB_OAUTH_TOKEN" ] ; then
echo -e "using anon api call"
else
echo -e "user and oauth token set"
alias curl='curl -u $GITHUB_USER:$GITHUB_OAUTH_TOKEN '
fi
## get release info and download links
LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/$GITHUB_PACKAGE/releases" | jq -c '.[]' | head -1)
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/$GITHUB_PACKAGE/releases" | jq '.[]')
if [ -z "$VERSION" ] || [ "$VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
echo -e "defaulting to latest release"
DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $LATEST_JSON | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i tmodloader.zip)
else
VERSION_CHECK=$(echo $RELEASES | jq -r --arg VERSION "$VERSION" '. | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .tag_name')
if [ "$VERSION" == "$VERSION_CHECK" ]; then
if [[ "$VERSION" == v0* ]]; then
DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $RELEASES | jq -r --arg VERSION "$VERSION" '. | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i linux | grep -i zip)
else
DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $RELEASES | jq -r --arg VERSION "$VERSION" '. | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i tmodloader.zip)
fi
else
echo -e "defaulting to latest release"
DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $LATEST_JSON | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i tmodloader.zip)
fi
fi
else
GITHUB_PACKAGE=Dradonhunter11/tModLoader64bit
## get release info and download links
LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/$GITHUB_PACKAGE/releases" | jq -c '.[]' | head -1)
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/$GITHUB_PACKAGE/releases" | jq '.[]')
if [ -z "$VERSION" ] || [ "$VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
echo -e "defaulting to latest release"
DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $LATEST_JSON | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i Linux)
else
VERSION_CHECK=$(echo $RELEASES | jq -r --arg VERSION "$VERSION" '. | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .tag_name')
if [ "$VERSION" == "$VERSION_CHECK" ]; then
if [[ "$VERSION" == v0* ]]; then
echo -e "Try 1"
DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $RELEASES | jq -r --arg VERSION "$VERSION" '. | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i Linux)
else
echo -e "Try 2"
DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $RELEASES | jq -r --arg VERSION "$VERSION" '. | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i tModLoader | grep -v -i vulkan | grep -v -i Windows)
fi
else
echo -e "Incorrect version, downloading the latest."
DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $LATEST_JSON | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i Linux)
fi
fi
fi
## mkdir and cd to /mnt/server/
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
mkdir Mods
rm -rf /mnt/server/.local/share/Terraria/ModLoader/Mods
## download release
if [ "-e -i tMod*" ]
then
echo -e "Removing old files"
rm -rf *
else
echo -e "Skipping file removal, first installation"
fi
echo -e "Executando 'curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}'"
curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}
echo -e "Decompressing files"
7z e ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/} -y
echo -e "Cleaning up useless files..."
rm -rf ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}

if [[ "${ARCH}" == "amd64" ]]; then
if [[ "$VERSION" == v0* ]]; then
chmod +x tModLoaderServer.bin.x86_64
chmod +x tModLoaderServer
else
#tiny startup script for backward compatibility
echo 'dotnet tModLoader.dll -server "$@"' > tModLoaderServer
chmod +x tModLoaderServer
fi
echo -e "Cleaning up extra files."
rm -rf terraria-server-*.zip rm ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}
if [[ "$VERSION" != v0* ]]; then
rm -rf DedicatedServerUtils LaunchUtils PlatformVariantLibs tModPorter RecentGitHubCommits.txt *.bat *.sh
fi
else
echo -e "skip"
fi

echo -e "Generating config file"
cat <<EOF > serverconfig.txt
||----------------------------------------------------------------||
Note: To change any value go to Propriedades, and change there!
Notas: Para alterar qualquer valor va para Propriedades, e altere la!
||----------------------------------------------------------------||
world=
worldpath=
modpath=
banlist=
port=
||----------------------------------------------------------------||
worldname=
maxplayers=
difficulty=
autocreate=
slowliquids=
seed=
motd=
||----------------------------------------------------------------||
password=
secure=
language=
EOF
echo -e "Complete Installation"

variables.name: World Name
variables.description: The name for the world file.

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: The maximum number of players a server will hold.

variables.name: Language
variables.description:
Sets the server language from its language code.
English = en-US, German = de-DE, Italian = it-IT, French = fr-FR, Spanish = es-ES, Russian = ru-RU, Chinese = zh-Hans, Portuguese = pt-BR, Polish = pl-PL

variables.name: Optimize
variables.description: Reduces maximum liquids moving at the same time. If enabled may reduce lags but liquids may take longer to settle.

variables.name: Secure
variables.description: Adds addition cheat protection to the server. (can lead to unjust bans
